revised_title: Anatomy and Development of the Pig Skull
tldr: The author examines the structure and development of the pig skull through the study of embryonic stages. They analyze the growth changes, skeletal parts, and connective tissues, comparing them to other vertebrate classes. The research provides insights into the transformation of the skull and face in mammals, contributing to the understanding of vertebrate evolution.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Comparative Anatomy
